entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers or drizzle beginning early this evening. Fog. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight then changing to snow before morning. Fog patches developing near midnight and dissipating before morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
